scripts.build:polyfill: rollup --config build/rollup.config.polyfill.cjs && rollup --config build/rollup.config.polyfill-compat.cjs && rollup --config build/rollup.config.polyfill-modern.cjs
scripts.build:sky: rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky-compat.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky-modern.js
